  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.http.converter.GenericHttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>, org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageConverter<java.lang.Object>

    public class MappingJackson2HttpMessageConverter
extends org.springframework.http.converter.json.MappingJackson2HttpMessageConverter
    Hack to use converter on local classpath since Jackson classes do not want to resolve otherwise.
